foreignData.name: Prächtige Hirschkuh
foreignData.text:
Lebensverknüpfung
Umwandlung {1}{W} ({1}{W}, wirf diese Karte ab: Ziehe eine Karte.)
Wenn du die Prächtige Hirschkuh umwandelst, lege eine Lebensverknüpfung-Marke auf eine Kreatur deiner Wahl, die du kontrollierst.

foreignData.name: Corcel radiante
foreignData.text:
Vínculo vital.
Ciclo {1}{W}. ({1}{W}, descartar esta carta: Roba una carta.)
Cuando actives la habilidad de ciclo del Corcel radiante, pon un contador de vínculo vital sobre la criatura objetivo que controlas.

foreignData.name: Jument de splendeur
foreignData.text:
Lien de vie
Recyclage {1}{W} ({1}{W}, défaussez-vous de cette carte : Piochez une carte.)
Quand vous recyclez la Jument de splendeur, mettez un marqueur « lien de vie » sur une créature ciblée que vous contrôlez.

foreignData.name: Destriero Splendente
foreignData.text:
Legame vitale
Ciclo {1}{W} ({1}{W}, Scarta questa carta: Pesca una carta.)
Quando cicli il Destriero Splendente, metti un segnalino legame vitale su una creatura bersaglio che controlli.

foreignData.name: 壮麗牝馬
foreignData.text:
絆魂
サイクリング{1}{W}（{1}{W}, このカードを捨てる：カードを１枚引く。）
あなたが壮麗牝馬をサイクリングしたとき、あなたがコントロールしているクリーチャー１体を対象とし、それの上に絆魂カウンターを１個置く。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — 大鹿・ユニコーン

foreignData.name: 화려한 말
foreignData.text:
생명연결
순환 {1}{W} ({1}{W}, 이 카드를 버린다: 카드 한 장을 뽑는다.)
당신이 화려한 말을 순환할 때, 당신이 조종하는 생물을 목표로 정한다. 그 생물에 생명연결 카운터를 올려놓는다.

foreignData.name: Cerva do Esplendor
foreignData.text:
Vínculo com a vida
Reciclar {1}{W} ({1}{W}, descarte este card: Compre um card.)
Quando reciclar Cerva do Esplendor, coloque um marcador de vínculo com a vida na criatura alvo que você controla.

foreignData.name: Кобылица Величия
foreignData.text:
Цепь жизни
Цикл {1}{W} ({1}{W}, сбросьте эту карту: возьмите карту.)
Когда вы совершаете Цикл Кобылицы Величия, положите один жетон Цепи жизни на целевое существо под вашим контролем.

foreignData.name: 光彩牝兽
foreignData.text:
系命
循环{1}{W}（{1}{W}，弃掉此牌：抓一张牌。）
当你循环光彩牝兽时，在目标由你操控的生物上放置一个系命指示物。

foreignData.name: 光彩牝獸
foreignData.text:
繫命
循環{1}{W}（{1}{W}，棄掉此牌：抽一張牌。）
當你循環光彩牝獸時，在目標由你操控的生物上放置一個繫命指示物。

name: Splendor Mare
originalText:
Lifelink
Cycling {1}{W} ({1}{W}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
When you cycle Splendor Mare, put a lifelink counter on target creature you control.

rulings.text: Some cards with cycling have an ability that triggers when you cycle them, and some cards have an ability that triggers whenever you cycle any card. These triggered abilities resolve before you draw from the cycling ability.
Triggered abilities from cycling a card and the cycling ability itself aren’t spells. Effects that interact with spells (such as that of Cancel) won’t affect them.

You can cycle a card even if it has a triggered ability from cycling that won’t have a legal target. This is because the cycling ability and the triggered ability are separate. This also means that if either ability is countered (with Disallow, for example), the other ability will still resolve.

text:
Lifelink
Cycling {1}{W} ({1}{W}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
When you cycle Splendor Mare, put a lifelink counter on target creature you control.
